snippet.title: SNES Longplay [564] Alien 3
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: TheVandal172

Based on the 1992 film Alien 3, set on Fiorina 'Fury' 161 Class C Prison Unit 12037154, you play as Ripley with standard but limited marine weapons. This is a different game from the 1992 Alien 3, which was also developed by Probe and ported to other systems, and different from the Game Boy titles developed by Bits Studios.

Lieutenant Ellen Ripley is the only survivor of the crash their spaceship in Fury 161, a desert planet inhabited by former convicts from a maximum-security prison.

LJN was an American toy company and video game publisher. It created toy lines and video games based on movies, television shows, and celebrities. It was headquartered in Midtown Manhattan, New York City, and later in Lyndhurst, New Jersey.

Alien 3 video game available on NES (1992), SNES (1993), Mega Drive (1992), Amiga (1992), Commodore 64 (1992), Game Gear (1994), Genesis (1992), Game Boy (1992), Game Boy Colour (1993) and SEGA Master System (1992). -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
